content.question: The 1920s photograph above illustrates a production process that led to

choices.label: government ownership of the automobile industry
the promotion of individual craftsmanship and pride among workers and artisans
lower prices and greater availability for mass-produced consumer goods
the establishment of training and educational requirements for workers
a sharp drop in labor union membership due to high employee satisfaction

content.answer: lower prices and greater availability for mass-produced consumer goods

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
